line_1: Or is in haste to take the Shears;
line_2: And if Fate spins Us longer Years,

line_1: Say, can the satirizing Pen of Shears,
line_2: Exalt his name, or mutilate his ears?

line_1: Is it not very often so in Shears?
Alse other wonders of the sportive shears
line_2: Globes, spiral columns, pyramids and piers
